caption: First time customer. Great food and friendly staff. I’ll be back again.
I liked the salad it was delicious
Excellent service the veggies are very fresh and well displayed, great customer service in a healthy & friendly environment.
My favorite selection is the warm box. Really love the different textures that it brings to the salad. Really refreshing way of eating healthy
Drove 45 mins from work all for them to be out of salad boxes. Who does the inventory here? They basically had to close for a few hours. Long story short really disappointing didn’t get my salad.
Fresh Salads that would have you feeling refreshed, Full, an ready to take on the rest of your beautiful sunny Florida Day!
Amazing place for a quick and healthy lunch!
this place sucks
Incredible healthy place, with so many choices - and fancy interior. Love it.

sometimes you just want a nice clean salad. and if you also need it in 4 minutes, this is the place for you. it’s clean, efficient, kind, and tasty. no outrageous prices, no massive menu, just clean food.  if you want instead to have an …
I always go for the Cobb but omg I tried the you+Omega 3, If you are a salmon lover you need to try that!

Anthony was great... wonderful customer service and the salad 🥗 completed his personality. He asked the right questions and the food was even better.  I had Ceasar w/ halloumi corn carrots avocado  ..n some croutons. 🔥🔥🔥🔥
Fast and fresh. The place is clean. Service is nice and fast. These salads made me full for all days. Excellent ingredients! I am satisfied
Salads taste great and are super healthy!
This place has amazing salads, although it is a bit on the pricey side, the portion size is huge and the versatility of their toppings makes up for it. Love this place!
Is a great place for super tasty salads, the portions are really good my favorite is the cobb salad. Try the sour guacamole dressing!
Great place to spend the time with your loved ones! My kids love this place!
Love it. First time eating so fresh and good.
Love it . Fresh tastes so good . First time love it
One of my fav locations for health food. went there on a saturday. service is typically good. it has a good feel to it.
Best salad concept yet!! ❤️❤️❤️
Health food at this location - super tasty. looking forward to coming back with my coworkers. it has a great feel to it.
My favorite location for delicious health food. Looking forward to returning with my relatives. The bill was average for the menu. Mood here reminds me of Colorado Springs area.
Great salads and awesome customer service!
Great Salads!  I had the You+Vitamins Box with chicken and it was absolutely amazing!
Health food and the atmosphere at this place is excellent. service is excellent even when they are busy. i'll return friends next time. the bill was decent for the quality.
A fav spot for quality Health food. this location is absolutely outstanding. service treated us so nice. this place has a cool feel to it.
Outstanding spot for quality Health food. Looking forward to coming back with my relatives. Reminds me of a cafe in Chicago I loved to visit.
health food, super good. Great hospitality. I had a cousin come into town and she asked me to go back here. The bill won't break you.
Nice location for tasty Health food. Staff is always nice even when they have a full house. This place has a nice feel to it. Not close to my job, I wish it was.

A preferred place for Health food. A favorite evening place of mine. The staff was very friendly and attentive. The place has an awesome atmosphere. Atmosphere is like a restaurant in Fort Worth I loved.
My preferred place for quality Health food. Stopped in on a Monday I think. This place has a great design.

I’m a daily customer of Downtown Salad Box. Today I bought 2 soups of lentil, when I take the first spoon the soup was very salty, it was too much so I couldn’t take it, so I came back to the store if it was possible to change it for other …
A top spot for tasty health food. Nice place to think about business. The service was very sociable and kind. This place has a good design.
A top scene for quality health food. Good place to relax and unwind.  Staff treated us so nice. It has a nice interior.
My favorite location for tasty Health food. The service was sociable and attentive. Bring your hunger - portions are generous.

Tasty, 😁 staff curtious and kind. Chicken is very juicy and tasty. Located facing cvs and next to metropcs sales office authorised dealer. Freshly shopped vegetables. Healthy choices obviously. Prices are fair. Not expensive at all. Give it a try for lunch and try it for yourself
This restaurant is terrific.  Healthy fresh food prepared right in front of you. Soups are excellent. Highly recommend
Best salad ever, I was so hungry today; had no time for a pict, sorry guys, great choice for a great healthy lunch..  you have to come, tou have to order it s delishhhh

I ordered 2 Ceasar salads today and recieved the opposite of what i ordered.  I haven't ate pork in over 20 years . It was strictly pork bacon all over both my salads. I tried to call and no one picked up. Very presentable but not what I paid for . Will never order here again . Highly mad about my 30.00 that I didnt get to enjoy .

terrible service, I ordered my food and it never arrived. I called one time and they told me the driver was on his way and my food would not take more than 10min (that was after waiting a full hour). Now I called again and nobody's answering... and my food never got here (It's been 2 and a half hours)
First time ordering from Salad Box. Salads were very fresh and the black bean soup was delicious. Mint/lime drink was superb. Thank you for the freshness. Delivery was very good, packed well.

Ordered online salad “omega”. This salad has nothing but a whole box of salad, which I could have bought for 3$ in a grocery store. There was literally one, yes 1 tomato!!!! A little bit of sids and like 2 grams of packaged salmon. No olive …
Very good food. And portions are sized fairly. I leave full.
Excellent!
Always a great place to eat light but its sooo fulfilling!
Perfect place for healthy meals

This is my first time here, and I can already say that I absolutely LOVE this place! The layout and decor give this establishment a modern and welcoming vibe. This place is definitely gunning for the cosmopolitan crowd, and it does an …

Next time you have a craving for Chipotle or Subway but want to eat something healthy and nutritious, try the Salad Box! The portions are very generous and well-worth the price. I ordered the Athena salad with mixed greens and added …

Salad Box is a healthy restaurant with delicious and high-quality food! My salad was fresh and crispy, the dressing was super tasty, there were plenty of toppings to choose from, and the size of the portion really makes it worth it. I loved the concept of salad in a box. Salad Box is proof that healthy food can be tasty and amazing.
Woah I love this place so far! Been ordering on Uber eats from a few months now ! I just can’t stop eating there ♥️
Ordered from Uber Eats a Cobb Salad. Chicken was super dry, like cardboard dry. First and last time I will get something from there.
This place was great.  Quick service with a HUGE selection of toppings for a salad.  I feel it was priced really well.  I created my own and even going over in toppings did not break the bank.
Delicious food!
Amazing staff, excellent service and the best salad we have ever had!
Lots of options for protein add-ons. Ingredients are fresh. Line can be long at lunch but not too bad.
Amazing quality ingredients! Fresh and very tasty

I discovered Salad Box via Postmates when searching for "healtlhy foods" and Salad Box popped up, so I've never been to the location but have ordered their Cobb salad 3 or 4 times from here, and it's consistent and always delicious, I have …
I love this place! The salads are fresh, healthy and customized so they fit into my diet days. The crew is so friendly, helpful and fast, I go back every time I get the chance!

Just tried the salad box warm bowl.  It was full of so much healthy, dense ingredients - it’s lasting me for at least two servings!   Love the idea of the homemade dressings.  I’ll definitely be back!!!

I recently found this gem in Brickell. I ordered a warm salad box & it did arrive warm! The delivery arrived 5 mins before it was scheduled.  The salads are spectacular , healthy & with great *homemade* dressings. I definitely will be ordering again soon! Can you please open one in Doral?
I literally love this place! Their concept is amazing! The staff is so helpful. Congrats to whoever runs this business. They are doing a terrific job. See you soon!
Amazingly good and delicious. Great service and they spoke English which isn't always a given in Miami.

Guys, this place is the truth! Whoever came up with the idea of putting a salad into a box deserves a prize! Add the delicious healthy food you get, the decent prices and you'll have a winner. And that's you btw. Love the concept and everything about this place!

Eating healthy food has always been my no. 1 priority. I've been in a continuous search of healthy food restaurants until I found Salad Box. They satisfy all my needs. Healthy, quick and fair prices. I used to go to Whole Foods, but I'm …

I've heard about Salad Box some months ago from a colleague that is crazy about this place. Now I have become a Salad Box addict! They make me crave for that food. So delicious and healthy at the same time. Salads never looked that good!

I'm a professional working around Downtown. Always bring my clients here. The set up is so nice, clean and neat. Prices are fair and the staff is amazing. Definitely recommend if you want to grab a quick healthy, delicious lunch for you and your clients.

Been here a couple of times, and each time I go, I'm more impressed with this place. Everything is amazing. <3 The food, the staff, the whole process. Even if the line looks long, they are very fast and always providing enough staff to handle the big lunch crowd. Try it and see it for yourself.
A friend recommended me the Salad Box and i was very pleased with everything. Great Place for a good Salad. Staff was super friendly and nice. I hope to come back soon.

While walking around downtown I stumbled upon Salad Box, due to the rush it seemed like the perfect option, and it was. The concept is simple, it's the typical "Chipotle" style restaurant, but this one is focused on salads. You get to …
Great downtown restaurant for healthy food options. Love the menu and the price. Great costumer service
Great food, fast service and delicious!

Love this place!! It's like fast food without the guilt because you are eating a healthy salad made fresh just for you.  Best of all, they deliver so some days I don't even have to leave my desk. The salad comes to me. Thank you Salad Box for existing.

It's hard to find a good salad place that is fast, fresh and can satisfy your craving for healthy options during a workday.  I'm grateful that I have found Salad Box.  Each time I order - I try to choose different salads.  I've customized …
Excellent salads and soups made with fresh ingredients. Quick and friendly service. An excellent healthy alternative to fast food!

Salad Box is the place to go for an amazing healthy meal! You can make your own recipe or have one of theirs. You can either have a salad or a Warm Box which is the equivalent of a warm bowl. The portions are huge and well balanced!! I …
High quality, delicious food, fresh ingredients, friendly staff. I would eat here everyday!!!

Great healthy food place ! They have the biggest salad bar I have ever seen! So many options! The food is so fresh and the recipes are mouthwatering. I'm so happy I have discovered this place. Wide selection of toppings, dressings, soups …

Wonderful place to have a quick healthy lunch! Everything is so fresh and tasty! All the dressings are made in house from scratch. I can't decide if Caesar or Ranch is my favorite. The salads are huge and the toppings are balanced. I have …

I absolutely adore the idea of Salad Box, and also loved patronizing them until I continued to receive incomplete orders when I utilized their Chownow delivery site. I sent emails (8/16/19) explaining to the company how displeased I was …

A good place for a quick salad.  The vegetables always seem fresh.  The (I think owner) is great when he is there, however the staff absent him are just like any other fast food place in SFLO.   It's pricier than Whole Foods, so if you …
So good . 😉👍
Beautiful Government Centers station,
Excelent food
Very savory. Had a friend come into town and asked me to take him here again. I can see why they have a lot of good reviews.
The salad toppings are just so basic and it’s so expensive for so little toppings
Great, and very fresh
Clean

Good salads, plenty of food, can never finish it in one sitting Be careful getting your dressing on the salad, sometimes they put the right amount, sometimes they put so much it soaks through the box and makes the salad inedible
Ok..  food is fresh but t should be cheaper...

Always fresh! Staff is nice and fast. a bit pricey but worth it, specially for the products quality. spinach and arugula base salad box is my fav with 5 toppings and any Xtra is $0.95. never tried the juices but everyone says they're good too.sometimes crowded at lunch time but lines go fast.

(Translated by Google) Have our suitcases deposited here via BAGBNB. Has worked great. Very nice service.  (Original) Haben unsere Koffer hier deponiert über BAGBNB. Hat super funktioniert. Sehr nette Bedienung.
Great juices and luggage store

Great option for a quick lunch during work days. Great salads, good price and amazing people working there. I totally recommend. You can choose a salad or create your own!!! The strawberry lemonade is also a great drink. One of the best options in downtown to eat in or take out.
went there on a friday i think. i think i might become a regular.
One of my favorite lunch spots in downtown! Definitely recommend.

Foods is good and app was working properly until now. App is being locked after a delivery is requested, not for a minute but for over a day. Also, nobody is picking up the phone of your Miami Downtwon location for 2 days in a row. If number changed, please update online as well as addressing the issues with the app. Thank you.

I have used Salad Box, Downtown Miami, to cater lunch for our busy Sales Office team. Many of the 13 team members have continued to make individual orders over the last year. The food portions are perfect, the price is affordable, and the food is fresh and delicious!
Really really bad quality , Chicken was raw , we couldn't eat our salad ... we had to throw in the garbage !!!

Ordered for food to be delivered. Paid extra for chicken. Salad came late with no chicken. Called the restaurant. No one picked up for 20 minutes. Finally got a hold of someone who said “well I don’t know what to say I just got here”. Asked …
Great selections to build your own delicious salad! Me and my friend absolutely loved it. Will come back often.
Great food with great protein selection on point, homemade dressings to die for.

Outstanding staff and had the most amazing salads here. The smoothies are really healthy as well and tastes amazing after eating. There are soups as well that fits really well with the cold weather here.

Food is amazing, staff even greater. Went in on Nov 27. I wanted to try something new even though salads weren’t really my thing. The staff helped me decide some flavors that I’ve never had before and definitely will come back for more
The best salad in Miami !!!

On November 27th around 9pm a friend of mine placed an order via UberEats for two Salads with protein: one with Tuna and one with Chicken. We got the delivery and tossed each of the salads out of the box and into individual plates. After …
Found a piece of mulch or wood in my salad box.
Food is really good and even when busy service is pretty quick . A lot of great options for everyone to choose from. Would definitely suggest trying at least once
Best Cobb salad ever

No little gem salads here! Saladbox salads are super tasty and super satiating! This was my first visit (certainly won't be my last) so I wanted to try the full on experience; I custom made my salad. It turned out to be a wonderful …
The place to go when visiting Miami!
Great location, friendly staff and a healthy and complete menu!
Best salads in Downtown Miami!!

If you want to eat green it’s a convenient option. But you feel like cattle when you’re eating out of a takeaway Chinese carton and sitting inside to eat, it cheapens trying to enjoy fresh ingredients. Also the ingredients such as the chicken do not taste too fresh, which defeats the point of green diet food.

Nice place and like the salad options.... But staff no nice. I was there in the afternoon, there were two boys one very and other one with attitude. Working with flip flops I know, I know it's not a fancy place but in flip-flops it does not look very nice working......
Love Salad Box!!! With all the different options they have, eating salads have become more interesting! Great customer service!

This is the perfect place for health conscious individuals, vegetarians, vegans and low carb dieters. The salads are made to order with fresh produce and a wide array of toppings. The portions are perfect and so are the prices. The dining …

Went for the first time today. Someone behind the counter explained their process and my options. I was able to customize my food which I love.  The salad was a lot of food for the price too. Definitely would go back.

Wow-I have visited the Salad Box several times and each time I discover something new that I love.  The choices and selection is amazing.  The food is tastes good and is good for you.  What an amazing restaurant - I can't get enough.  See you soon.
The only problem is trying to figure out what to eat. Everything is so good. Amazing place with amazing service. Definitely a step up from the typical Miami service.
Great salad and protein options.  Simple, great healthy lunch choice!
This place has awesome salads and all for under $10! My boyfriend and I go here for last minute dinners. It's great quality for a  very fair price.
Awesome! It's like a chipotle for salads. High quality produce and plenty of healthy dressings for salad. I think they make sandwiches too.
Awesome food! Awesome knowledgeable staff!! Love it!
Excellent build your own salad at an excellent price.
(Translated by Google) -big portion -good taste -beautiful ambience in the store -good price  (Original) -große Portion -guter Geschmack -schönes Ambiente im Laden -guter Preis

Another Fast casual .. this time salad concept..I had the most wanted salad (that is the name )  with yogurt dressing  , big salad.but not really enough dressing and the chicken was meh and chewy ! Overall not a great salad , maybe the …
Just amazing place, Love the price/quality

I can believe this people I ask them if they can take the apple juice from the smoothie and they said that everything was all made and they can not charge the recipe, after I see then making my smoothie from scratch. Only in Miami people lie to your face and make you feel like a idiot.

I really like this place.  They prepare deliver orders really fast and the salads are surprisingly tasty.  They're tossed lightly in a dressing and they give you extra dressing on the side.  I recommend building your own salad and adding extra proteins for the best value.
Great staff and food. However (comma) they must do something about the mosquitos that fly around or what ever those are. They aren't touching the food but stil.

Good to eat.... Bad to work at.... Got fired for being pregnant... That tell you the kind of people after showing loyalty for a year thats how they repay u, nd waited till i was showing to dismiss me ...
Simple salad
Great health place with fresh juices.

I actually enjoy eating a salad from here! Always fresh leaves, delicious mix ins, speedy service! You can download the app and pre order your salad so that you don’t have to wait long if you’re on a tight lunch schedule. Also the delivery fee is reasonable.
First time there and staff was so friendly explaining everything. Love how you can mix grains and greens. Great interior and delicious soup!! Will be back.
Smelled amazing when we walked in. Food on point.

Really the BEST salad I've EVER had.  I make myself a salad every day at home for lunch and for dinner and I make my own dressing, so I'm really particular about the freshness of the greens and what's in my salad.  Since it is a meal for …
Wish there was one next to my work! I tried the Athena and highly recommend it.
Amazing food! Especially the avocado in my vegan salad 👌🏻
Great place! Unbelievable, great tasting salads. My favorite place to go for lunch.
Excellent choice of salads and fresh juices. Number One addition to my healthy day-to-day routine.
Amazing!
